item.title: Stop using this thing! Please!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Users are being told to avoid using Internet Explorer until Microsoft patches a serious security hole in it. BBC Article May I recommend using this instead? It's got a pretty logo and everything!
item.excerpt:encoded: Users are being told to avoid using Internet Explorer until Microsoft patches a serious security hole in it. BBC Article May I recommend using this instead? It's got a pretty logo and everything!
